navigation-desktop-line1: Lateral movements: Click and drag with the mouse over the gallery.
navigation-desktop-line2: Forward/Backward: Use the mouse wheel or the vertical arrows keys.
navigation-desktop-line4: Change wall: Use the space bar or the buttons that appear when placing the mouse on the end of each wall.
navigation-desktop-line5: Zoom details mode: Hold down the Control key while clicking with the mouse on the work. Use the mouse wheel to zoom and the upper button to exit
navigation-desktop-line6: Start/stop the video:Hold down the Control key while clicking
navigation-mobile-line1: Lateral movements: Drag a finger horizontally on the gallery.
navigation-mobile-line2: Forward/Backward: Zoom with two fingers (pinch) on the gallery.
navigation-mobile-line3: Change wall: Use the buttons that will appearance when you touch with your finger at the end of each wall.
navigation-mobile-line4: Artwork zoom mode: Press and hold an artwork until activate the zoom mode. Use your fingers to zoom and the upper button to exit
navigation-mobile-line5: Show placard: Press an artwork until the placard appears.
navigation-mobile-line6: Start/stop the video:Long press on the video
